H0.text: What type of beverage does a barista prepare and serve . Tea

H1.text: What type of beverage does a barista prepare and serve . Hot Chocolate

H2.text: What type of beverage does a barista prepare and serve . Smoothie

H3.text: What type of beverage does a barista prepare and serve . COFFEE

A4.text: A barista is a person, usually a coffeehouse employee, who prepares and serves espresso-based coffee drinks and other beverages.

A5.text: The preparation of other beverages, particularly milk-based drinks such as cappuccinos and caff√® lattes, but also non-espresso coffee such as drip or press pot, requires additional work and skill for effective frothing, pouring, and latte art.
